channel.title: The Terminal List: Dark Wolf on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Terminal List: Dark Wolf on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Taylor Kitsch Unpacks the Anger and Redemption in His ‘Terminal List: Dark Wolf’ Origin Story
item.description: The actor talks about how years of Navy SEAL training helped him play his ruthless CIA operative, Ben Edwards, in the Prime Video adaptation of Jack Carr’s bestselling novels.

item.title: Taylor Kitsch Unpacks the Anger and Redemption in His ‘Terminal List: Dark Wolf’ Origin Story
item.description: The actor talks about how years of Navy SEAL training helped him play his ruthless CIA operative, Ben Edwards, in the Prime Video adaptation of Jack Carr’s bestselling novels.

item.title: ‘The Terminal List: Dark Wolf’ Boss David DiGilio Talks Franchise Future and How His 2011 ‘Tron’ Script Paid Off 14 Years Later
item.description: The prequel series to the Chris Pratt-starrer isn’t just a spinoff — it’s meant to bridge the Jack Carr cinematic universe, says DiGilio of his hopes for the now Taylor Kitsch-led story.

item.title: ‘The Terminal List: Dark Wolf’ Boss David DiGilio Talks Franchise Future and How His 2011 ‘Tron’ Script Paid Off 14 Years Later
item.description: The prequel series to the Chris Pratt-starrer isn’t just a spinoff — it’s meant to bridge the Jack Carr cinematic universe, says DiGilio of his hopes for the now Taylor Kitsch-led story.

item.title: Sydney Sweeney Walks the Carpet For ‘Americana,’ ‘The Terminal List: Dark Wolf’ Premieres and This Week’s Best Events
item.description: Inside this week’s biggest Hollywood premieres, parties and openings.

item.title: Taylor Kitsch Plays CIA Special Ops Agent in ‘The Terminal List: Dark Wolf’ Trailer
item.description: The Prime Video prequel for Chris Pratt’s ‘The Terminal List’ series, also starring Tom Hopper, taps into the dark side of war as Ben Edwards goes from the Navy SEALs to CIA operations.

item.title: Taylor Kitsch Plays CIA Special Ops Agent in ‘The Terminal List: Dark Wolf’ Trailer
item.description: The Prime Video prequel for Chris Pratt’s ‘The Terminal List’ series, also starring Tom Hopper, taps into the dark side of war as Ben Edwards goes from the Navy SEALs to CIA operations.
